summary: Build a marketplace app to help local entrepreneurs get recognized and sell their products, organized into ~6 business categories.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Marketplace app logo, simple modern mark with warm earth-tone palette (logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Hero illustration showing a friendly local market scene with small business stalls/products in a clean vector style (hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Implement authentication with Internet Identity for entrepreneurs so they can manage their seller profile and product listings; allow unauthenticated users to browse categories, sellers, and products.

Build the customer-facing browsing experience: a home page that highlights the marketplace purpose, a category navigation for approximately 6 categories, product browsing with category filtering, product detail view, and seller profile view showing seller info and their products.

Build an entrepreneur dashboard for creating and managing their presence on the app: create/edit seller profile (e.g., business name, description, category, contact info) and create/edit/delete product listings (e.g., title, description, category, price, optional image URL).

Add a simple “interest/order request” flow that lets a customer submit a purchase interest message for a product (stored as an inquiry linked to product + seller), so the app supports “sell their product” without requiring external payment integrations.

Apply a cohesive visual theme and layout for an initial v1 marketplace, with a distinct style (not blue/purple): define color palette, typography, spacing, and component usage and apply consistently across pages (home, category browse, product detail, seller profile, dashboard).
Generate and include static brand assets for the app (logo + hero illustration) and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve via backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a marketplace app for local entrepreneurs to list and sell products within the app
Support browsing/filtering by approximately 6 business categories (category-based organization of sellers/products)

Create the core marketplace data model and APIs to support local entrepreneurs listing products and being discovered by customers, including: (a) business categories (approximately 6 categories), (b) entrepreneur/seller profiles, (c) product listings tied to sellers and categories, and (d) public browsing/search endpoints.

projectName: Local Entrepreneurs Marketplace with 6 Business Categories
